name: PowerPoint Formatting
description: Tests the model's ability to apply proper PowerPoint-specific formatting to presentations

prompts.text: Create a corporate presentation with consistent formatting based on a slide master approach. Describe how the slide master should be set up with primary and secondary colors, font choices for headings and body text, consistent footer elements, and logo placement. Then create sample slides that follow this master formatting, including a title slide, section divider, content slide with bullets, and a data slide.

Create a presentation with properly formatted PowerPoint objects. Include slides with: 1) Properly formatted text boxes with appropriate margins and alignment, 2) Shapes with consistent fill, outline, and effects, 3) A properly formatted chart with labeled elements and consistent colors, 4) An image with appropriate cropping, borders, and effects, and 5) Properly aligned and distributed multiple objects on a single slide.

object_formatting.description: Proper formatting of different object types

design_principles.description: Application of design principles in formatting
